headline: Repairs continuing on hydrocracker at Marathon Galveston Bay Texas Refinery, sources say
summary: Repairs were continuing onTuesday to a diesel-producing hydrocracker at MarathonPetroleum's 631,000-barrel-per-day Galveston BayRefinery in Texas City, Texas, said people familiar with...

headline: Marathon Petroleum Honored With Port of Long Beach Green Flag Award
